      void addBuildNewIndexEntries()
      Will add reindex enteries for all content on all servers in the cluster including this one It will also add an entry telling other servers to start building a new index

      Deletes Records older or greater than d day(s), minutes(s) from dist_reindex_journal
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> findCacheEntriesToRemove()
      Will return only the entries for the specific server the code is executed on This method will also delete all entries from the table that are returned in the select

      Will return only the reindex entries for the specific server the code is executed on This method will also delete all entries from the table that are returned in the select
